full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 57 of 236 LC3KMAX2 Alessi - Cross 961 1 THE COURT: You will be provided one before we show the witness. 2 MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. 3 MR. PAGLIUCA: Does the witness have JA-1? 4 THE COURT: Not yet. 5 Ms. Comey, are you ready? 6 MS. COMEY: Yes, thank you, your Honor. 7 THE COURT: Go ahead. 8 BY MR. PAGLIUCA: 9 Q. Do you see JA-1, Mr. Alessi? 10 THE COURT: Mr. Alessi, could you reposition the mic, please. Thank you. 11 12 A. Yes, I am reading. 13 I can't remember where this was done. Where? 14 15 Q. Mr. Alessi, I'm just going to ask you a couple of questions. 16 First, is that your signature? 17 A. Yes, it is. 18 Q. It's dated July 9, 2020; is that correct? 19 A. That's correct. 20 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, before this is read, I would 21 make the same objection. I don't believe this is inconsistent. 22 THE COURT: Which paragraph are you focused on? 23 MR. PAGLIUCA: Your Honor, I was going to move for the 24 introduction of the entire exhibit. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012571
